subject: Steroids
Decisions and Verdicts
Football
lead_paragraph: A state appeals judge in Minnesota upheld a lower court ruling that allowed the N.F.L. to suspend the two Vikings players, who were found to have taken StarCaps, a supplement that included a banned substance.
snippet: A state appeals judge in Minnesota upheld a lower court ruling that allowed the N.F.L. to suspend the two Vikings players, who were found to have taken StarCaps, a supplement that included a banned substance.
